ygData.subject: Looking for Xakra Bile & rockhopper blood
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I m trying to do the progressive pottery quest with my vah shir bard, but I m running into supply issues. I ve tried killing all the worms & young
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I'm trying to do the progressive pottery quest with my vah shir bard,
but I'm running into supply issues.

I've tried killing all the worms & young rockhoppers I can find in the
Shar Val Pit, but I can't seem to find the bile & blood! I got just
enough bile to get my drum & to get the first part of the pottery quest
done, but I can't seem to get any more!!

So far I know Xakra bile drops off of Xakra Larvae & the rockhopper
blood drops off of young rockhoppers .. both in the shar val pit.

Any suggestions?

Thanks
Ariaya, Ranger of 20 seasons
Cariaya, Bard of the 8th circle
Sariaya, Enchanter of the 9th circle
Heart of the Dunedain, Terris-Thule Server
ariaya@...
